ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews Rambozo; One Fine African Afternoon; One-Shots; Jeers II; The Cracked List of What's Hot and What's Not; Form & Function Looks at the Summer Olympics; Vernon Swallowing's Friend; Didja Notice on Star Trek...?; Lunch Break!; One Fine Day in the Great Outdoors; G.I. Joke Gets Totally Thrashed; What's the Score?; Things That Can Scare You to Heck!; What Rock Stars Were Like As Children; One-Shots Looks at the Olympics; Viva Las Vegas; If Rambo Fought Other Wars; See Sickness
ComicInfo.Summary:
Explorers finally discover the elephants' graveyard -- complete with tombstones.
Humorous observations about Star Trek.
A man in Las Vegas puts an envelope in a mailbox. The mailbox spits out letters like a slot machine.
What would World War I, the US Civil War and the Revolutionary War have been like with Rambo fighting in them?
Paintings of oceans cause a sailor to become sick.
ComicInfo.Writer: Joe Catalano,Don Martin,Roger Brown,Gary Fields,John Severin,Bo Badman,Banx,Shawn Kerri,Bill Wray,George Gladir
